entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cypress Hills Provincial Park 11:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 29 except minus 22 near the Trans-Canada Highway. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 29 except minus 22 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of snow early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 17.
